A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I'll be honest: this is the first time I've reviewed a movie on here.

Because it was that Terrible.

Everything\, from it's treatment of Legacy characters (Luke\, Chewie\, 3PO) to it's poor treatment of it's Own characters (Finn\, Poe\, Holdo) is how Not to make a movie.

The Training scenes were laughable\, the Casino was Cringy\, and of course there's the famous Leia scene.

The only halfway decent scenes were the space battle and lightsaber fight\, and even Those are ruined by the scenes that follow.

Also\, You'll notice most of the "Positive" reviews say almost Nothing about the movie (so which ones are Actually bots?)
